  • Constructor Details

    • Editor

      public Editor()

  • Method Details

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus​(java.io.File file, boolean change)
      Updates current session status.
      Parameters:
      file - file or null, if session is not currently saved in any file
      change - change in content of current session

    • updateTitle

      public void updateTitle()
      Updates title.
      - if not saved yet - Untitled
      - else file name
      - if user change content of current session, "*" is added in front of file name
      + (- Graph editor)

    • saveBeforeClosing

      public boolean saveBeforeClosing()
      Method for displaying "Save before closing" alert in case the current session was not saved.
      Returns:
      boolean value, whether alert was handled correctly or if it was needed at all

    • fileChooser

      public javafx.stage.FileChooser fileChooser()
      Invokes window for choosing file with specific filters.
      Returns:
      window for choosing file

    • chooseFileToOpen

      public java.io.File chooseFileToOpen()
      Opens fileChooser and lets user choose file to open
      Returns:
      file chosen by user to open

    • chooseFileToSave

      public java.io.File chooseFileToSave()
      Opens fileChooser and lets user choose file to save current session.
      Returns:
      file chosen by user to save current session

    • closeWindowRequest

      public void closeWindowRequest​(javafx.stage.WindowEvent event)
      Method that handles close request
      Parameters:
      event - event

    • newAction

      public void newAction()
      Method for handling process after clicking "New" option in File tab in menu.
      - if current session has not been saved yet, saveBeforeClosing() method gets called

    • openAction

      public boolean openAction()
      Method for handling process after clicking "Open" option in File tab in menu.
      - if current session has not been saved yet, saveBeforeClosing() method gets called
      Returns:
      boolean whether Open action was handled correctly (false = either some error occurred or file to Open does not exit)

    • saveAction

      public boolean saveAction()
      Method for handling process after clicking "Save" option in File tab in menu.
      - if file has not been saved yet, saveAsAction() gets called instead
      - else content of current session gets written into file
      Returns:
      boolean value whether Save action was handled correctly (false = iff saveAsAction() returns false)

    • saveAsAction

      public boolean saveAsAction()
      Method for handling process after clicking "Save As" option in File tab in menu.
      - firstly, fileChooser window opens for user to choose file to save current session into
      - current session is saved into chosen file afterwards
      Returns:
      boolean value whether Save As action was handled correctly (false = either file to save does not exit or error occurred)

    • exitAction

      public void exitAction()
      Method for handling "Exit" option in File tab in menu. - window closes iff file current session is saved (or if there was no change)

    • clearTextFields

      public void clearTextFields()
      Method for clearing textfields.

    • clearNodes

      public void clearNodes()
      Method that resets canvas and deletes nodes internally.

    • handleCanvasChange

      public void handleCanvasChange()
      Method for updating status of session if canvas change occurred.

    • makeVertexDraggable

      public void makeVertexDraggable​(Vertex vertex)
      Method for making vertex draggable in canvas, bounds for vertex not to go outside of canvas included and tracking last action made in canvas.
      Parameters:
      vertex - vertex which is set to be draggable

    • edgesContainingVertex

      public java.util.List<Edge> edgesContainingVertex​(java.util.List<Edge> edges, Vertex vertex)
      Method for checking if there exists an edge containing vertex in graph.
      Parameters:
      edges - list of edges in the graph
      vertex - vertex that is made to be looked for in list of edges
      Returns:
      list of edges containing said vertex (empty list if there is none)

    • existsEdge

      public Edge existsEdge​(java.util.List<Edge> edges, Vertex vertexFrom, Vertex vertexTo)
      Method for checking if there exists edge [vertexFrom, vertexTo] in graph.
      Parameters:
      edges - list of edges in the graph
      vertexFrom - start vertex of an edge
      vertexTo - end vertex of an edge
      Returns:
      edge, if there exists one (null, if there is not)

    • readFromFile

      public void readFromFile​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Method for reading graph from .txt file and putting it onto canvas.
      - the way graph is represented in .txt file is written in manual
      Parameters:
      file - file represennting graph in .txt format
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Method for writing graph into .txt file.
      - the way graph is represented in .txt file is written in manual
      Parameters:
      file - file in which graph will be saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception

    • readFromFileReal

      public void readFromFileReal​(java.io.File file) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method for reading graph from .txt file and putting it onto canvas.
      - the way graph is represented in .txt file is written in manual
      - graph has all the modifications user set during the session graph was made
      Parameters:
      file - file represennting graph in .txt format
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception
      java.lang.Exception

    • writeToFileReal

      public void writeToFileReal​(java.io.File file) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method for writing graph into .txt file.
      - the way graph is represented in .txt file is written in manual
      - graph has all the modifications user set during the session graph was made
      Parameters:
      file - file in which graph will be saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception
      java.lang.Exception
